alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Shelby (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 5:13AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SHELBY AND FRANKLIN COUNTIES THROUGH 545 AM EDT... At 513 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of New Castle to near Shelbyville. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Frankfort, Shelbyville, Simpsonville, Pleasureville, Montclair, Elmburg, Harvieland, Old Christianburg, Bridgeport and Hatton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
